title: Shiny new toy
content: So...got a box, and in that box is a new bike. I just got it, and it hasn't even been out in the woods yet. If the bikes doesn't fit, its going back to the shop.  I blanked out the bike in paint, as I am not yet sure if I'm am going to keep it.  Speaking of paint, turns out its fun! So are these pictures random?..
